oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-08-27 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from August 27, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer Marty Robbins, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Vaden, Chubby Wise, Moon Mullican, Rod Brasfield, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Snow; Jordanaires; Marty Robbins; Tommy Vaden; Chubby Wise; Moon Mullican
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Hank Snow -- Honeymoon On A Rocket Ship (Hank Snow) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces the Jordanaires -- Let's Make A Joyful Noise (Jordanaires) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Marty Robbins -- Maybelline (Marty Robbins) -- Hank Snow introduces Tommy Vaden and Chubby Wise -- Arkansas Traveler (Tommy Vaden fiddle, Chubby Wise fiddle) -- Hank Snow talks -- (The Angels Are Lighting) God's Little Candles (Hank Snow) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Prince Albert jingle (Hank Snow) -- Hank Snow introduces Moon Mullican -- Someone More Lonesome Than You (Moon Mullican)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Snow, Hank; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Mullican, Moon, 1909-1967; Jordanaires (Musical group); Wise, Chubby; Vaden, Tommy; Robbins, Marty
